setEffects.2: While the equipping character is in Nightsoul's Blessing and is on the field, their DMG dealt is increased by 15%.
setEffects.4: After the equipping character consumes 1 Nightsoul point while on the field, CRIT Rate increases by 40% for 6s. This effect can trigger once every second.

flower.name: Reckoning of the Xenogenic
flower.desc: A flower meticulously carved from black crystal. It emits a mysterious light at night.

plume.name: Root of the Spirit-Marrow
plume.desc: A feathered accessory made in imitation of an ancient dragon's wing. Perhaps it was once a memento of some forgotten history.

sands.name: Myths of the Night Realm
sands.desc: A mysterious ritual element that is neither a timepiece nor a compass. Nowadays, no one has any idea what it is used for.

goblet.name: Pre-Banquet of the Contenders
goblet.desc: A vessel that seems to have been made by twisting and forming stone in a seemingly whimsical fashion. But it is an open question as to who possesses such strength...

circlet.name: Crown of the Saints
circlet.desc: A crown made of obsidian that in ancient times was used in coronation ceremonies by noble tribal kings.
